title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 107.7 - When sale may be effected
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 107.7 - When sale may be effected

State Regulations

The Comptroller may effect a sale to the selected purchasers
upon receipt of a final offer to purchase the COPS. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
107.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
